name: Daddy is a liar
description:
Daddy is a liar is a horror video game set in the Chamberí subway, backrooms and liminal spaces.

In this game we are a little boy who must survive a supernatural subway full of dangers and mysteries, this place is a hostile and unpleasant space all the time.

An ambitious and complicated project, which we have been able to finish thanks to the hard work and help of our tutors and colleagues, we hope that the game is entertaining and that you like it.

Created by:
